markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cradle Minder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1673)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 103</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) This animal can be purchased as a pet, but cannot be combat trained or contribute to combat in any way._

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sought after in Cheliax, the cradle minder resembles an [imp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=109). Despite rumors they were given as part of household pacts with [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30), these creatures were bred from fiendish [frog](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1680). Amphibious, they have leathery wings, frog-like eyes, and a forgiving temperament. They're ideal companions for children, as they tend to bond closely with one person and let out loud croaks when they become aware of danger. They require fiendish earthworms (unique feed) regularly, so ensuring you have a stable food supply is a necessity for ownership.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cradle Minder
